Latest version: 0.8.0 (alpha)

Maven integration

To include RoboBinding to your project dependencies, add the following to your POM:

<dependency>
	<groupId>org.robobinding</groupId>
	<artifactId>robobinding</artifactId>
	<version>0.8.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
</dependency>

If you're using the AspectJ-powered features of the framework, then you'll need to add both the AspectJ runtime dependency and the AspectJ Maven plugin.

To your dependencies add:

<dependency>
	<groupId>org.aspectj</groupId>
	<artifactId>aspectjrt</artifactId>
	<version>1.6.11</version>
</dependency>

To your build plugins, add:

<plugin>
	<groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId>
	<artifactId>aspectj-maven-plugin</artifactId>
	<version>1.4</version>
	<executions>
		<execution>
			<phase>process-sources</phase>
			<goals>
				<goal>compile</goal>
			</goals>
		</execution>
	</executions>
	<configuration>
		<aspectLibraries>
			<aspectLibrary>
				<groupId>org.robobinding</groupId>
				<artifactId>robobinding</artifactId>
			</aspectLibrary>
		</aspectLibraries>
		<source>${maven.compiler.source}</source>
		<target>${maven.compiler.target}</target>
	</configuration>
</plugin>

<plugin>
	<groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
	<artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
	<version>2.3.2</version>
	<configuration>
		<source>${maven.compiler.source}</source>
		<target>${maven.compiler.target}</target>
	</configuration>
</plugin>
